Package nl.tudelft.jpacman.npc.ghost

This package contains some approximate implementations of the original Pac-Man AIs.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Blinky
    An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Shadow.
    Clyde
    An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Pokey.
    Ghost
    An antagonist in the game of Pac-Man, a ghost.
    GhostFactory
    Factory that creates ghosts.
    Inky
    An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Bashful.
    Navigation
    Navigation provides utility to navigate on Squares.
    NavigationTest
    Tests the various methods provided by the Navigation class.
    Pinky
    An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Speedy.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GhostColor
    A list of supported ghost colors.

Package nl.tudelft.jpacman.npc.ghost Description

This package contains some approximate implementations of the original Pac-Man AIs.

  • The original AIs for Pac-Man are fairly well described on strategy wiki.org.
  • Information on locations on the original board: http://strategywiki.org/wiki/Pac-Man/Tips
  • Detailed specs on the ghost AIs: http://strategywiki.org/wiki/Pac-Man/Getting_Started
